idea: Witty detective with a dark past
Cynical medic who can hear ghosts
Retired monster hunter pulled back in
Clockwork tinkerer with a human heart
Haunted bard who remembers future songs
Daring skyship pilot chasing living storms
setting: Shattered archipelago where cities float above an endless storm belt; guilds hoard wind-lore.
A city built inside a petrified god; memories become spirits that must be archived or set free.
Broken kingdoms after a demon winter; fiendish contracts persist like legal curses.
Forests rearrange every dawn; cartographers are folk heroes and oracles argue with maps.
Crystalline lunar shards crashed into the sea; refugees barter starlight technology for sanctuary.
Neon monastery in a megacity; scriptures live in glitching data-ghosts.
Vertical jungle reserve threaded through arcology levels; fauna evolved alongside drones.
Steam-and-sigil railways where packages are oath-bound; couriers duel with contracts.
Harbor city where ghost tides roll in nightly; offerings are tickets to the afterlife ferries.
Industrial league debates personhood of constructs; artisan unions sponsor sentience trials.
